alert.note: Alert for Bee; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 16 at 4:08AM CST until February 16 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Today... .A cold front will continue to move across South Texas early this morning. In response, strong north wind and drier conditions are expected to develop. The combination of low relative humidity values and strong wind may result in critical fire weather conditions today. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF THE COASTAL PLAINS... The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon today to 4 PM CST this afternoon. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Bee, Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces and Inland San Patricio. * TIMING...From 12 PM to 4 PM CST Thursday * WINDS...North 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 60. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Residents are urged to exercise care with respect to all outdoor activities that could inadvertently cause wildfires. Report wildfires quickly to the nearest fire department or law enforcement office.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio
